Producer: Toby Jaffe, Vin Diesel, Jason Kothari
Production Co: Sony Pictures Entertainment, Mimran Schur Pictures, Cross Creek Pictures
Rating: PG-13 (Language|Intense Sequences of Violence|Some Suggestive Material)
Synopsis: Recently killed in action, soldier Ray Garrison gets a new lease on life when the RST Corp. brings him back from the dead. With an army of nanotechnology in his veins, he's an unstoppable force -- stronger than ever with the power to heal instantly. But when the company decides to manipulate his mind and memories, Garrison must embark on a desperate mission to find out what's real and what's not.
Title: Bloodshot
